definition: branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The ripest peach is highest on the tree.
sentences.chinese: 最成熟的桃子在最高的枝條。

sentences.english: He suggests shading plants with bed sheets, shade cloth or brush -- in other words, sticks and branches.
sentences.chinese: 或者用灌木叢，換句話說，也就是枝條。

sentences.english: This is when a bone is bent and breaks along only 1 side, like a young stick of wood.
sentences.chinese: 當骨頭彎曲，且就一側邊折斷，如同一根青嫩的枝條。

sentences.english: Little sparrows fluttered among the branches.
sentences.chinese: 小麻雀在枝條間飛來飛去。

sentences.english: The naked branches seemed to shiver with horror of the cold.
sentences.chinese: 光禿禿的枝條抖動着，彷彿它們也懼怕嚴寒。

sentences.english: The illuminated rods inside the China Pavilion represent a bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 中國館中發光的的枝條表現出一片竹林。

sentences.english: But that wild music burthens every bough.
sentences.chinese: 只是那野曲壓抑着枝條。

sentences.english: Night found him leg weary, with hands and face lashed by the branches.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚來了，他腰痠腿痛，手和臉被枝條打得又痛又腫。

sentences.english: Soon new branches and leaves grow out from the bud.
sentences.chinese: 很快新枝條和葉子就從苞蕾裏生長出來。

sentences.english: Rattan, and half had decayed, some of the branches in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 藤，身子一半已朽，一些枝條亂於風中。

sentences.english: A slender shoot or branch with its leaves, flowers, or fruits.
sentences.chinese: 具有葉花或果的纖細枝條。

sentences.english: A single branch may bear several catkins .
sentences.chinese: 一根枝條可着生幾個花序。

sentences.english: The lemon geranium sloughs dry brown leaves at the base of its branches.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬天竺葵枝條底部棕色的枯葉會脫落。

sentences.english: The tree is smaller than other orange trees, with slender twigs and lance-shaped leaves.
sentences.chinese: 橘樹株形小於其它柑橘類果樹，枝條細，葉呈矛狀。

sentences.english: The naked branches seemed to shiver with horoor of the could.
sentences.chinese: 光禿禿的枝條抖動着，彷彿它們也懼怕嚴寒。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
to sprout (leaves, buds, a beard etc)
